name: Union luxembourgeoise de l'Ã©conomie sociale et solidaire
goal:
Established in July 2013, ULESS aims to defend and promote the interests of the social and solidarity economy. Its mission is priorly to represent, promote and defend by all appropriate means the various stakeholders active in the field of social economy in Luxembourg.

ULESS's main missions are:

- to ensure national representativeness of the social economy sector and defend its causes and interests;
- to promote social and solidarity economy in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg and to actively contribute to its development;
-to develop pertinent business development and support services to social entrepreneurs;
- to spread the values and principles of cooperation, association, sharing and solidarity.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Internal Market
euInitiatives:
Social Business Initiative
Social Innovation Europe
Public procurement
Employment and social policies
